name: Resort Zero
description:
Submission for Haunted PS1 Summer Of Screams.

A travel writer, a deadline and a hotel full of wrong.

Talk to your fellow guests in this wing of an infamous resort and try uncover the truth behind this peculiar holiday destination.

Controls:
WSAD to walk/select dialogue options

MOUSE to look

SPACEBAR to interact/select dialogue

By:
Jae Stuart (@jemztones)
Programming, Environments

Justin Tam (@tamtzekin)
Writing, Music, Sound Design

T-Dog eXtreme (@tdogextreme)
Character Art, Paintings, Additional Writing

Grace Huang (@thatgracehuang)
User Experience, Production & QA

Environment Texture credits to come.
